description: This comprehensive online travel platform is designed to simplify booking and managing travel plans. Users can easily search for and book flights, hotels, rental cars, and even bus and train tickets, ensuring a wide range of travel options. Additionally, the platform offers curated holiday packages, providing a one-stop solution for all travel needs. Key features include itinerary management to keep track of travel details, personalized travel recommendations to enhance the journey and user reviews for informed decision-making. The app aims to deliver a seamless and cost-effective travel planning experience, catering to every aspect of a user's trip.

Traveler.description: The Traveler uses the platform to plan, book, and manage their travel itineraries, including flights, accommodations, and transportation.

OnboardingFlow.description: Provide travellers an overview of the app features, such as easy flight and hotel bookings, holiday packages, bus and train ticket reservations and user reviews, ensuring a seamless travel planning experience.

FlightsHome.description: The Flights section allows users to search, book, and manage flight reservations.
FlightsHome.sections:
1. SearchFlights: A search bar with fields for departure and destination cities, travel dates, number of passengers, and travel class.
    2. FlightList: A list of available flights based on search criteria. Each card displays airline name, flight number, departure and arrival times, duration, and price. Each card includes a 'Book Now' button. which on click would navigate to flight detail page.
    3. FilterAndSort: Filter options for airlines, price range, duration, layovers, and flight times. Sort options by price, duration, and departure time.
    4. 'Add to favorites' button which on click would be added to the Favorites.

FlightDetail.description: Displays detailed information about a specific flight, including flight times, seat availability, and amenities.
FlightDetail.sections:
1. FlightOverview: Summary of the flight, including airline name, flight number, departure and arrival times, duration, and price.
        2. Amenities: List of amenities provided during the flight, such as in-flight entertainment, meals, and Wi-Fi.
        3. BaggagePolicy: Using accordion field displays the information about the baggage policy, including carry-on and checked baggage allowances.
        4. CustomerReviews: List of customer reviews and ratings for the flight.
        5. ProceedTopayment: a card displaying the ticket details and a 'Book now' button which on click would navigate to a payment detail view.

HotelsHome.description: The Hotels section allows users to search, book, and manage hotel reservations.
HotelsHome.sections:
1. SearchHotels: A search bar with fields for destination city, check-in and check-out dates, number of guests, and room type.
    2. HotelList: A list of available hotels based on search criteria. Each card displays hotel name, star rating, location, price per night, and a brief description. Each card includes a 'View Details' button which on click would navigate to hotel detail view.
    3. FilterAndSort: Filter options for price range, star rating, amenities, and guest rating. Sort options by price, star rating, and guest rating.
    4. 'Add to favorites' button which on click would be added to the Favorites

HotelDetail.description: Displays detailed information about a specific hotel, including room types, amenities, and guest reviews.
HotelDetail.sections:
1. HotelOverview: Summary of the hotel, including name, star rating, location, and a brief description.
        2. RoomTypes: List of available room types with descriptions, photos, and prices. Using card.
        3. Amenities: List of hotel amenities, such as free Wi-Fi, pool, gym, and restaurant.
        4. Photos: Carousel of photos showcasing the hotel and its facilities.
        5. CustomerReviews: List of customer reviews and ratings for the hotel.
        6. BookingOptions: Options for booking a room, including guest details and 'Book now' button which on click would navigate to payment detail page.

PaymentDetail.description: The Payment Details screen allows users to enter and manage their payment information for bookings.
PaymentDetail.sections: CardInformation:Fields for entering credit/debit card details, including card number, expiration date, and CVV., PaymentSummary:Summary of the payment amount, including a breakdown of charges and taxes.,SavePaymentOption:Option to save the payment method for future bookings.,PaymentButton:'Pay now' button to confirm and process the payment.

Bookings.description: Displays the user's current and past bookings with details and management options.

BookingsScreen.description: Lists all bookings with options to view details, modify, or cancel reservations.
BookingsScreen.sections: UpcomingBookings: Displays a list of upcoming travel plans, each item in the list has 'View Details' button which on clicking would navigate to bookings detail page,PastBookings: Displays a list of previous trips, each item in the list has 'Download receipts' which on click downloads receipts and 'Rating and Review' button which on click user would able to provide ratings and review

BookingsDetails.description: Displays detailed information about a specific booking, including trip itinerary, accommodation details, and booking management options.
BookingsDetails.sections:
1. BookingOverview: Summary of the booking, including trip name, dates, and booking reference number.
    2. Itinerary: Detailed day-by-day itinerary of the trip, including activities, sightseeing, and meal plans using accordion field.
    3. AccommodationDetails: Information about the accommodations booked, including hotel names, addresses, and check-in/check-out times.
    4. FlightDetails: Using cards displays the information about booked flights, including airline, flight number, departure and arrival times, and seat assignments.
    6. PaymentSummary: Summary of payment details, including total cost, amount paid, and balance due.
    8. TransportationDetails: Information about any additional transportation bookings, such as car rentals or airport transfers, including pickup and drop-off times and locations.
    9. ActivityDetails: Information about any pre-booked activities or excursions, including activity name, date, time, and meeting point.
    12. Documents: A section for downloading necessary documents like e-tickets, hotel vouchers, and itineraries.
    13. ReviewsAndRatings: Option for the user to rate and review their booking experience after the trip.

Admin.description: The Admin oversees the entire platform, managing user accounts, monitoring transactions, and ensuring regulatory compliance.

OnboardingFlow.description: Guides new admins through setting up their account and managing listings, user roles, and analytics.

LandingPage.description: The first page that displays to admins, showcasing an overview of administrative features and tools.
LandingPage.sections: 1. HeroSection: Contains a summary of admin capabilities with some images and a 'Get Started' button. Clicking the button navigates to the Welcome Screen.

WelcomeScreen.description: Introduces the platform's admin features to new admins with a welcoming image and text.
WelcomeScreen.sections: 1. IntroSection: This section contains a welcome message and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Profile Setup Screen.

ProfileSetupScreen.description: Allows admins to set up their profile information including name, role, and contact details.
ProfileSetupScreen.sections: 1. ProfileForm: This section includes fields for entering profile details such as name, role, shift, ID number, etc., and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Listings Management Setup Screen.

ListingsManagementSetupScreen.description: Guides admins through the initial setup of listings management including property details, availability, and pricing.
ListingsManagementSetupScreen.sections: 1. ListingsForm: This section includes forms and fields for setting up property listings, including property details, availability dates, pricing information, and a 'Next' button that navigates to the User Management Setup Screen.

UserManagementSetupScreen.description: Allows admins to configure user roles and permissions, manage user accounts, and oversee user activities.
UserManagementSetupScreen.sections: 1. UserRoles: This section includes options for setting up different user roles and access levels, managing user accounts, and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Booking Management Setup Screen.

BookingManagementSetupScreen.description: Guides admins through the setup of booking management tools to handle reservations, cancellations, and customer inquiries.
BookingManagementSetupScreen.sections: 1. BookingSettings: This section includes options for configuring booking settings such as reservation rules, cancellation policies, customer inquiry management, and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Analytics Setup Screen.

AnalyticsSetupScreen.description: Guides admins through the setup of analytics and reporting tools to monitor performance and user engagement.
AnalyticsSetupScreen.sections: 1. AnalyticsConfig: This section includes options for selecting key performance indicators (KPIs), setting up reports, and a 'Finish' button that completes the onboarding process.

LoginScreen.description: Allows admins to create a new account or log in to an existing one.
LoginScreen.sections: 1. LoginFields: This section contains fields for email and password with a 'Login' button.

DashboardScreen.sections:

sections:
